title: Research by rockets
creator_credit: National Academy of Sciences (U.S.), Lothar Wolff, Arnold Frutkin and Stanley Ruttenberg
brief_description: The use of rockets as tools for scientific research in the upper atmosphere. How rockets are the means of placing scientific instruments into the high atmosphere in order to measure space phenomena. Includes footage of experimental rocket flights in the 1920’s.
creator_credit_for_label: National Academy of Sciences (U.S.), Lothar Wolff, Arnold Frutkin and Stanley Ruttenberg
